scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Moses, kneeling and holding the Tablets of the Law, which are inscribed with lines representing text. Above and behind him, a bearded figure, likely God or a divine messenger, is shown. To the right, a group of people are gathered, some looking towards Moses. The background features architectural elements resembling stylized buildings with arched openings and decorative finials. The overall composition suggests a divine revelation or the transmission of sacred law.
